title: LoL Randomly Freezing For A Few Seconds

embed.description: a guest Jan 7th, 2019 1 Never Not a member of Pastebin yet? Sign Up , it unlocks many cool features! 000000.000| ALWAYS| Logging started at 2019-01-08T13:24:26.667 000000.006| ALWAYS| Begin command line toggles... 000000.006| ALWAYS| -UseNewX3D = 1 000000.007| ALWAYS| -UseNewX3DFramebuffers = 1 000000.007| ALWAYS| End command line toggles.

body:
Hi All

On a clean windows 10 install and a clean LoL install I am experience constant game freezes in both client and in game.

My most recent game (logs attached) had freezes at these times:
2.02
4.24
4.30
17.25

Any ideas whats going on?

replies.body: *UPDATE* still happens. I didn't record time stamps of when it happens as it is quite random. The game will freeze for a moment (1-5 seconds max) then resume. But it can happen quite often during a skirmish or a team fight (a moment that matters). Was wondering if any of these issues are similar.
Same and i noticed that it appens at the same time as my brother (we are on the same connection)
Same here dude, annoying as fuck.
